Uppy
  • plugins
  • Uppy
Uppy with a variety of options to provide unique looking Uploading Files And Images that matches project's design standards. For more info on the original Uppy please visit the official Uppy Documentation.
Here Default example of Uppyapplied to upload Files and Images
                                                
@include('General.Uppy.uppy', [
    'limited'=>false,
    'limit'=>10,
    'type' => 'documentAndImage',
    'domId' => 'id',
    'url' =>'',
])
Here Default example of Uppyapplied to upload Images
                                                
@include('General.Uppy.uppy', [
    'limited'=>false,
    'limit'=>10,
    'type' => 'image',
    'domId' => 'id',
    'url' =>'',
])
Here Default example of Uppyapplied to upload Document
                                                
@include('General.Uppy.uppy', [
    'limited'=>false,
    'limit'=>10,
    'type' => 'document',
    'domId' => 'id',
    'url' =>'',
])
Note if Need To Detect Max Number Of Files Add limited with True Value and Detect Number of Files by Add limit With Number Value
